title: beautifully upgraded condo $800
posting_body: WELCOME HOME to this beautifully upgraded condo ~ Light, bright & airy ~ Well maintained & turn-key ~ Volume ceilings ~ Custom paint ~ New vinyl planks throughout, plantation shutters, new plush carpet in primary bedroom w/ updgraded padding~ Generous sized primary bedroom with ceiling fan, walk-in closet & large on-suite with lots of counterspace ~ Spacious family room w/ ceiling fan ~ Genersous sized kitchen with plenty of cabinets, counterspace, granite counters, undermount sink & breakfast bar ~ Kitchen opens to nook area ~ New dishwasher ~ Washer & dryer have their own laundry closet ~ Cozy balcony w/ mountain views invites you to enjoy your morning coffee or tea!
All appliances included ~ Community offers a gym, clubhouse, pool & spa ~ Freeway access, Centennial Hospital & shopping nearby!
